thread.title: Salman Khan says yes to Shah Rukh, no to Sanjay Leela Bhansali
thread.title_full: Salman Khan says yes to Shah Rukh, no to Sanjay Leela Bhansali

author: Deccan
title: Salman Khan says yes to Shah Rukh, no to Sanjay Leela Bhansali
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Subhash K Jha | October 23, 2015, 23.26 pm Salman Khan Salman Khan might be thinking of mending fences with his one-time buddy turned enemy Shah Rukh Khan, but he doesn’t share the same feelings when it comes to Sanjay Leela Bhansali.
While he has allowed the trailer of SRK’s Dilwale to be released with Prem Ratan Dhan Payo this Diwali, he won’t allow the trailer of Bhansali’s Bajirao Mastani to be attached to any of his films .
A source close to the actor says, “A month back Eros International released Hero (produced under Salman’s banner) and the trailer of Bajirao Mastani was to be attached to it since Eros is co-producer of both.
“However, Salman put his foot down. Again, now for Salman’s big Diwali release Prem Ratan Dhan Payo, Sanjay Bhansali was keen to have the trailer of Bajirao Mastani attached to it but Salman hasn’t agreed.”
Mutual friends say Salman and Bhansali had a fall-out when the filmmaker signed Shah Rukh Khan for Devdas. Says a friend, “Salman never forgave Bhansali for what he saw as a betrayal. Ironically now Salman and Shah Rukh are friends, while Bhansali is left out in the cold.”
